In the next step you will see Secret Phrase (12 words) that allows you to recover a wallet.
If lose my secret phrase, my funds will be lost forever.
If expose or share my secret phrase to anybody, my funds can get stolen.
PlutoPe support will NEVER reach out to ask for it.
Do not delete this backup file on Google drive, or you risk losing all your crypto!
At least 8 characters, including one upper-case letter, one lower-case letter, one number, and one symbol.
Do not lose this password, as PlutoPe cannot reset it for you!
Never share your secret phrase with anyone
Your 12-word secret phrase is only way to recover your wallet. Please store it securely!
Tap the words to put them next to each other in the correct order.
Typically 12 (Sometimes 18,24) words separated by single spaces
Restore your wallet with the 12-word secret phrase or with Google drive.
Restore your wallet with the 12-word secret phrase.
Choose the backup for the wallet you want to restore
If you don\'t see your backup, try to sync your Google drive.
Please review the PlutoPe Terms of Services and Privacy Policy.
I\'ve read and accept the Terms of Services and Privacy Policy.
Your secret phrase is the master key to your wallet and anyone that has it can access your crypto, Never share it!
Never share your Secret Key with anyone, for any reason. Treat it as you would treat your most valuable possession. Remember, PlutoPe will never ask you for your Secret Key.
One Wallet for all your needs
Anyone can create a token, including fake versions of existing tokens. Learn about scams and security risks.
Adds an extra layer of security when using the app
Add this address to your address book
You have not referred anyone yet!
Are you sure you would like to delete this wallet?
Make sure you have backup of your wallet.
I have read and agree to the membership agreement
Tap and hold to view phrases
If you loos access to this device, your fund will be lost, unless you back up!
Enter the encryption password you created for your Google Drive secret phrase backup.
Confirm password did not match with password!
Import an existing wallet or\ncreate a new one
Never share your secret phrase with anyone, store it securely!
You need to withdraw 0.01 or more
Just top up your crypto in your card and you are good to go. Your PlutoPe card works at all merchants that take Mastercard.
Just top up your card with crypto and you are good to go. Your PlutoPe card works at all merchants that take Mastercard.
Are you sure you want to delete drive backup?
Before deleting your Drive backup, ensure a manual backup is in place for your data\'s security.
This password is used to protect your wallet and provide access to the browser extension. It cannot be reset and is separate from your mobile wallet.
%1$s wants to connect to your wallet
Your card will be shipped to the address provided.
forword arrow for show forword redirection
Please search domain name from searchbar
Already have an account? Sign In
I have read and agree with PlutoPe Terms and Conditions
I have read and agree with Terms and Conditions
Enter the SMS code we\'ve sent to your phone
We will send you a verification link. verify your email to receive communications about your account or subscriptions
The password must meet some conditions tap here to view more information
To order the card you need to pass verification
Withdraw your digital assets to cash from ATMs in 200+ countries
You can use the card anywhere in the worldwhere VISA is accepted
Shipping rates may vary depending on the delivery address for your order
If you encounter any troubles with the identity verification process, we will return your funds in full
You will pay 0.000066 ETH and get VISA plastic card
As we\'re processing your payment, there\'s one step left you to get your card. Verify your identify to complete your order.
Email confirmation is required. if you didn\'t receive the email, Click here

Welcome to our KYC-1 Process. Ensure security and integrity. 

Upload ID docs: 
(1) Passport.
(2) Driver's License.
(3) National ID Card. 

Now you can start kyc-1 process with any of above identification document.
I have read and agree with the Terms and Conditions of Payment Cards
Please note that the final rate will be fixed, when you confirm the transaction
Create a wallet to hold all your favorite crypto currencies in one place
We accept only Mastercard and VISA debit bank card
The billing address is the address associated with your bank card -it is used to verify your credit card information. The address must be the same as you give to your bank to be accepted
Unlock the power to use your crypto anywhere in the world with our seamless spending options.
Spend your Crypto Anywhere in the world
Enter the phone number provided during registration
Choose one of the available documents to get started
Take a clear and high-quality photo of your chosen document
We partner with a trusted identity verification service to keep your personal data safe and never share it with third parties.
We\'ll compare this with your document
💡 The password must meet three conditions
The password must be at least 8 characters long.
The password must contain at least one digit.
The password must contain at least one letter.
The password must not be equal to the phone number.
The password must not contain information from the user profile.
The password cannot be the same as any of the previous five passwords.
The password must not be too simple, for example, \'12345678\'
You have the maximum fiat limit
Buy crypto with your bank card
The recipient doesn’t need to have a PlutoPe account
Enter an address and send crypto in a flash
Please enter amount you want to send
Please select are you related or not from USA?
You\'ve successfully topped up your card
Verify now to get your card in a few minutes
Some of the submitted documents don\'t meet our requirements
Please update your shipping address.You haven\'t updated it before.
Please update your shipping address.You haven\'t updated it before.
Please complete Payment Process. You haven\'t complete it before.
Your Card is Waiting for Activation Are you sure you want to Cancel Card Order?
Your Card is In Progress Are you sure you want to Cancel Card Order?
Enter your CVV / CVC to proceed
Your order was successfully completed. The card will be with you soon.
Spend your Crypto Anywhere in the world
Get a physical or virtual card in minutes that is accepted at more than 42 million merchants worldwide
The Plutope wallet operates across multiple chains, delivering lightning fast transactions. No more manual network selection
Transact, stake, withdraw, buy and sell your cryptocurrencies with ease
Your transaction is pending please verify with email
To use our App, please, provide next information. Entered data below must match your ID
Are you sure you want logout?
Are you sure you want to exit from PlutoPe?
Your kyc process in under review.

Thank you for submitting your KYC information. Our team is currently reviewing the provided documents and information. This process typically takes some time to ensure compliance with regulatory requirements and maintain the security of our platform. We appreciate your patience and understanding. Rest assured, we\'ll notify you of any updates or additional steps required. If you have any urgent concerns, please don\'t hesitate to contact our support team.

Congratulations! Your KYC-1 verification process has been successfully completed and approved. We appreciate your cooperation throughout this initial verification phase.\n\nNow that your KYC-1 process has been approved, we\'re moving forward with the KYC-2 process to further enhance the security and compliance of your account. Our team will guide you through the additional steps required for KYC-2 verification.
Don\'t have card yet? Sign up
Don\'t have an account? Create an account
Don\'t receive the OTP? Resend OTP
Order a crypto debit card now
Your new password must be different from previously used passwords
Avoid three identical or sequential numbers in a row
Explore a world of unlimited possibilities with a single wallet, empowering you to do more with your digital assets

8-32 characters long
Lower and uppercase Latin letters
At least 1 number
At least 1 symbol
Enter the email related to your account
Can’t see your transaction? Explore it now.
